import React from 'react' import '../styling/quick-facts.css' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' const QuickFacts = ({ userRepos }) => { const [totalCommits, setTotalCommits] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { if (userRepos.length > 0) { const accessToken = localStorage.getItem("accessToken"); // Retrieve access token from localStorage getTotalCommits(userRepos, accessToken).then(setTotalCommits); } }, [userRepos]); // Depend on userRepos return (

commits

) } export default QuickFacts
